title: All Of You
description: Sukie O’Leary has survived breast cancer, a career change and a whole town of nosy neighbors...But can she survive the searing attraction for the local hockey hero who’s owned her heart since childhood? Does she have the strength to survive the one night of passion they’ve promised each other without getting burned? Or should she listen to the whispers of her knowing heart– and take a chance on love.
author: Kelsey Maxwell
